price: 67. Uf! Sin kee sin yallittey Yallak kalah taqbudeenik, tokkel edde tanin uma taama ixiggi hayteenih makas-kassowtaanaa? Keenik iyye.
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
